title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. Multiple selection could be enabled. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives). NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: f. Need a width hint for the dialog. g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release. KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: The 'OK' button is enabled even when there is no selection in the editor selection dialog.
EB: The 'OK' button should be disabled when there is no selection in the editor selection dialog.
SR: 1. Open the preference page and go to the Workbench File Editors section. 2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry. 3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section and note that there is still no selection. 4. Press 'OK' and observe that it adds the selected external editor.
